can we use like this?
inputs = {'source': utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[0]), 'target_sparse': (utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[1].indices), utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[1].values), utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[1].dense_shape)), 'source_len': utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[2]) }
body_text:
can we use like this?
inputs = {'source': utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[0]), 'target_sparse': (utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[1].indices), utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[1].values), utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[1].dense_shape)), 'source_len': utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[2]) }
body:
can we use like this?
`inputs = {'source': utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[0]),
              'target_sparse': (utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[1].indices), utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[1].values), utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[1].dense_shape)),
              'source_len': utils.build_tensor_info(pred_data[2])
              }`
